How to play:-

A 3x3 grid to represent the board.
Two players with symbols "X" and "O".
Player X starts the game by putting an X.
Players take turns placing their symbols in an empty square on the grid.
The first player to get three of their symbols in a row (horizontally, vertically, or diagonally) wins the game.
If all 9 squares are filled and neither player has three in a row, the game is a draw.
Press "Reset Game" to reset both the game board and the scoreboard.
Press "New Game" to continue playing with the existing score on scoreboard, but the game board will get empty to start again.

Start the game
